name: Secret Mission (itch) (Bardon)
description:
You must kill the General of the enemy. On the way to the headquarter you think you must die, but you reach it. As you enter the HQ you have only one bullet!

When the soldiers in the HQ see you you lose a live. Keep the bullet only for the General, find and kill him!

I have made this gam in only 3 hours!
